author: Nexcell Pride
text:
This was the best stream ever... :_ハート:
An Utawaku showing the "Bloom" results.
For some reason, Rushia's voice sounded a bit different... Maybe it was Microphone equalization. 

And memorable not only by "Iris", also I was captivated by her "Wishing" cover. :_ちょうちょ:

And if previous stream ("Undertale" gameplay) was New PC debut, this stream was definitively the "Home moving"
I wonder if Rushia will have a Creative Commitee.
Notes:
- "Be Happy" by Ucchii0 returned as Opening.
- Undefined normal stream's BGM
- Stream was running at 1080p and 60 fps.

author: Amai Ta. Yume
text:
I am glad this is archived. I have been here from time to time, but I wanted to type some things first. I'm glad this was my emotional support and of course I really love seeing Rushia sing what she loves to sing as well! Well done EN and JP Bros!! Thank you for the support to Rushia!

Oh Rushia! I may have less time to watch some of the livestreams, but I still do my best to attend from time to time because I really love your singing. I can't waste all of my money yet though, it's investment for my future, but I want you to know that I will always love you as my top # 1 Idol and my best friendly vtuber ever and I'll never stop supporting you, so keep doing what you want to do there and I'll wholeheartedly support you (and I'm still watching your livestream and archive!) Have fun with the fandead and the other new people here!! Otsurushi~!
